title: Github pipeline fails after quarkus and jdk upgrade

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

Hi upgraded my quarkus maven project.
Earlier JDK - 11
Upgrade JDK - 21
Earlier quarkus - 2.3.0.Final
Upgraded quarkus version - 3.5.0
---
When I build the project with mvn clean install in locally IntelliJ, it works fine. But when it is build on Github pipeline, it fails

### Expected behavior

Pipeline should pass

### Actual behavior

[[1;31mERROR[m] Failed to execute goal [32mio.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.5.0:generate-code-tests[m [1m(default)[m on project [36mq2t-common[m: [1;31mExecution default of goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.5.0:generate-code-tests failed: An API incompatibility was encountered while executing io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.5.0:generate-code-tests: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 'boolean org.apache.maven.settings.Mirror.isBlocked()'

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
